column5: I have some unexpected free time for a few weeks in August and would like to drag my TR22 Triton fiberglass bass boat from Missouri to fish somewhere new in Canada. I don't care to troll but am after anything that will tug on the line; 100% catch and release guy. I am blessed with an ample budget but will fish alone unless a guide comes along. Your thoughts are most welcome.
PM sent. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Unless your wanting to drive hours longer. West side of rainy or lake of the woods out of morson is as good as anywhere up there that you can drive too.
Lost Island Lodge might be available in August. Great for small mouth bass, walleye and northern. About 200 miles north of International Falls. Check out their web site.
Go up to the Shield part of LOTW, maybe Sioux Narrows. High end lodge there in Totem.
Thank you for the suggestions, gentlemen.
